pages.text: The blocks Dynamic Tank, Dynamic Glass, and Dynamic Valve make up the multi-block that is the Dynamic Tank, a fluid storage structure that can hold a large amount of a single type of fluid.$(p)Dynamic Tanks can be made in any size from 3x3x3 to 18x18x18, and does not need to be a cube.

A valid Dynamic Tank structure will flash with "active redstone" particles upon completion.$(p)Notes:$(li)All of the Dynamic Tank's borders must be made out of Dynamic Tank (not glass or valve)$(li)The tank's length, width, and height can be any number within the size limits - e.g. 3x4x5
